panel__settings__advanced__logging__titl.message: Enables console logging for the extension.

panel__settings__advanced__logging__subh.message: This is an advanced settings, it is purely technical and does not impact features.

panel__settings__advanced__logging__leve.message: The cumulative level of logging (defaults to error).

panel__settings__advanced__logging__hist.message:
The maximum number of lines to keep in memory.
 Note that too many line might impact performance.
